string.name: Index_downloads_illegal_chars_in_filename
string.value: A file name cannot contain any of the following: \ / : * ? " < > |

string.name: permission_reason_READ_PASTEPOARD
string.value: For suggesting shortcuts to urls in clipboard

string.name: Downloads_notice_content
string.value: Due to security issues, all downloads are temporarily stored here. You have to manually save them to local storage before exiting this app! - Next time when the app is launched, they will be deleted!

string.name: Settings_homepage_shortcuts_manage_desc
string.value: Clicking the blank area on Homepage could also bring you here!

string.name: Paralleow_description
string.value: Meowing feature to browse two tabs at the same time!

string.name: Settings_experience_sys_back_to_access_backward
string.value: Use system back to access backward

string.name: Settings_experience_web_force_dark_mode
string.value: Force websites to be in dark mode

string.name: Ads_block_desc_1
string.value: If Ads Blocker is enabled, ads identified on all sites would be blocked.

string.name: Ads_block_desc_2
string.value: However, if some sites' domains is added to this whitelist, ads on those sites would be allowed.

string.name: History_desc_1
string.value: All browse history will be shown here, in time order.

string.name: History_desc_2
string.value: Long press a record to select. After entering selecting mode, tap on other records to multi-select.

string.name: Ads_block_desc_3
string.value: Long press a domain to select. After entering selecting mode, tap on other domains to multi-select.

string.name: Fail_desc_import_bookmarks
string.value: The HTML file picked may be broken, the file format is not yet supported...

string.name: Fail_desc_empty_picked_file
string.value: The HTML file picked may be empty... Or you have picked, nothing?

string.name: Fail_tips_general_call_liny
string.value: If you believe that this is not your fault, please contact Liny to report a bug or for help!

string.name: Fail_desc_move_bookmarks_folders
string.value: The destination directory chosen may be right inside the folder we are moving!

string.name: Fail_desc_new_bookmark
string.value: The name or link may be empty... Or the name may be duplicate with another bookmark here!

string.name: Fail_desc_new_folder
string.value: You may forgot to give it a name... Or the name may be duplicate with another folder here!

string.name: Fail_desc_no_name
string.value: Forgot to give it a name!

string.name: Fail_desc_no_link
string.value: Forgot to fill the link field!

string.name: Fail_desc_folder_current_name_crash
string.value: There is a folder with a duplicate name in the current directory!

string.name: Fail_desc_bookmark_current_name_crash
string.value: There is a bookmark with a duplicate name in the current directory!

string.name: Fail_desc_folder_destination_name_crash
string.value: There is a folder with a duplicate name in the destination directory!

string.name: Fail_desc_bookmark_destination_name_crash
string.value: There is a bookmark with a duplicate name in the destination directory!

string.name: Fail_desc_duplicate_domain
string.value: There is a duplicate domain existing already!

string.name: Fail_select_bad_image
string.value: Selected a broken image? Or you selected nothing at all!

string.name: Whats_new_content
string.value:
Tried to fix bug of weird crashing on launch
Customizable homepage background image!

string.name: Whats_new_content_extra
string.value:
Perhaps also some bugfix? Liny the lazy didn't put them here, maybe...
 (～o￣3￣)～

string.name: Credits_issues
string.value: And especially, the improvement of this project would not be ever achieved without these devs and users who opened really important issues: ↓

and Browser CE (Westinyang's Fork!)

string.name: Credits_extra
string.value: And, you, my friend! So grateful that you are probably really putting this poorly built app into daily use and always being there with love and support. THANK YOU!! :3

string.name: Example_text
string.value: Three hundred and fifty-eight thousand llamas crossed the Hulunbuir Grassland!

string.name: Settings_storage_clear_webview_desc
string.value: The statistics shown below may (is usually) not up to date. A manual refresh by clicking 󰃈 may be essential if you wish a accurate figure.

string.name: intelligent_tracking_prevention_desc
string.value: Restrict tracker sites (as third parties) inserted into other pages from sending network requests with cookies:

string.name: Settings_manage_cookies_this_site
string.value: Here we are viewing some Cookies of current site:

string.name: Settings_manage_cookies_clear_all
string.value: Due to some constraints, we could only provide such a button to clear all cookies of all sites:

string.name: Settings_manage_cookies_desc_1
string.value: Cookies are a series of cached data stored in local storage either temporarily or permanently, here in this app, encrypted.

string.name: Settings_manage_cookies_desc_2
string.value: They remember your accounts, your passwords, your login statuses... Plenty of things.

string.name: Settings_manage_cookies_desc_3
string.value: Clearing cookies may fix some weird web errors, but a site may require you to login again if its cookies are cleared.

string.name: Settings_js_already_disabled
string.value: Tips: JavaScript on this site has been disabled!

string.name: Settings_js_desc_1
string.value: Toggle "Disable JavaScript" on to enable this feature, then choose to disable on all sites, or on specific sites.

string.name: Settings_js_desc_2
string.value: If turn "Disable JavaScript" on while having "Disable JavaScript on all sites" off, then JavaScript would only be disabled on these sites added to the list.

string.name: Settings_js_desc_3
string.value: By the way, disabling JavaScript may cause some sites to break, while, however, causing some nice effects as well. :P

string.name: Settings_image_all_sites
string.value: Disable web images on all sites

string.name: Settings_image_some_sites
string.value: Disable web images on these sites

string.name: Settings_image_already_disabled
string.value: Tips: Images on this site has been disabled!

string.name: Settings_image_desc_1
string.value: Toggle "Disable web images" on to enable this feature, then choose to disable on all sites, or on specific sites.

string.name: Settings_image_desc_2
string.value: If turn "Disable web images" on while having "Disable web images on all sites" off, then web images would only be disabled on these sites added to the list.

string.name: Settings_image_desc_3
string.value: By the way, disabling web images may cause some sites to break, but may also boost the load speed and save data as well. :P

string.name: Homepage_background_desc
string.value: Images of a wrong size would be wrongly displayed~ Contents at center position would be prioritized in showcase!

string.name: Accessibility_desc_linysProgress
string.value: This is a Web loading progress bar, indicating the current web page loading progress.

string.name: Accessibility_desc_linysLink
string.value: This is a Link. After clicking, will open a new tab and load the link.

string.name: Accessibility_desc_linysShowButton
string.value: This is a special Button. After clicking, a corresponding panel will open nearby.
